SQL.LOAD: SELECT rule_list_id, rule_id, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, rule_list_detail_id FROM elp_rule_list_detail WHERE rule_list_detail_id = :rule_list_detail_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT RULE_LIST_DETAIL_ID, RULE_LIST_ID, RULE_ID, EFFECTIVE, EXPIRATION, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by FROM ELP_RULE_LIST_DETAIL WHERE RULE_LIST_ID = :RULE_LIST_ID
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_rule_list_detail SET rule_list_id = :rule_list_id, rule_id = :rule_id, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE rule_list_detail_id = :rule_list_detail_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_rule_list_detail ( rule_list_id, rule_id, effective, expiration, created_by, rule_list_detail_id ) VALUES ( :rule_list_id, :rule_id, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :rule_list_detail_id )
SQL.LOAD_RULE_LIST: SELECT RULE_ID ID, CODE, DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_RULE WHERE EXPIRATION > :ACTIVE_ON
